Comments_List: Standard L3 Material - learning characters, taking dictations and tests, speaking in class and tutorials. All well taught and it's easy to develop a routine!

I think that they way characters are taught (in groups of 30-45) is too difficult to memorize. Maybe learning new characters in groups of 10 will make it easier for students to keep up with the material.
Grading between the oral test site and Canvas is confusing, and instructions are frequently unclear.
